short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interacts with the quick active tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Active Tab is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing instant access to the URL of the active tab. With just a single click, you can retrieve the URL of the tab you're currently viewing, allowing for quick reference and seamless navigation.

Features:

Instant Access: Retrieve the URL of the active tab with a single click.
Convenient Popup: The extension's intuitive popup interface displays the active tab's URL for easy reference.
Streamlined Browsing: Save time and effort by swiftly accessing the URL of any tab without navigating through menus or settings.


Whether you're conducting research, referencing articles, or managing multiple tabs, Quick Active Tab simplifies your browsing workflow, making it an essential tool for Chrome users. Install now and streamline your browsing experience today!
